summary: Completed testing of UltraCloud SMS bug fixes. All 4 reported bugs have been verified as fixed: 1) SMS History page loads without crashing (getServiceName handles undefined codes), 2) Reseller Portal loads without infinite reload, 3) API Documentation page is accessible, 4) Admin branding colors save and persist correctly. Backend tests: 13/14 passed. Frontend tests: All critical flows working.

minor.issue: Endpoint returns 404 - may not exist or require different path

passed_tests: SMS History page loads without crashing
getServiceName returns 'Unknown' for undefined service codes (fix verified)
Reseller Portal loads without infinite reload (initialFetch state fix verified)
Reseller Portal shows Total Orders, Total Revenue, Markup Discount, Balance
API Documentation button accessible from Reseller Portal
API Documentation page displays endpoints with curl examples
All 7 branding color fields present (button_color_hex, accent_color_hex, header_bg_color_hex, hero_gradient_from, hero_gradient_to, primary_color_hex, secondary_color_hex)
Branding colors persist after page refresh
User profile endpoint returns correct data
critical_code_review_comments: SMS History fix: getServiceName now has null check - returns 'Unknown' for undefined codes
Reseller Portal fix: useEffect uses initialFetch state to prevent infinite reload loop
Admin branding fix: fetchPricing now reads all branding color fields including button_color_hex, accent_color_hex, header_bg_color_hex, hero_gradient_from, hero_gradient_to
Reseller cancel order fix: Backend now decrements total_revenue_ngn and total_orders on cancel
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 reported bugs have been fixed and verified: 1) SMS History getServiceName fix working - shows 'Unknown' for undefined codes, 2) Reseller Portal infinite reload fixed via initialFetch state, 3) API Documentation accessible via button in Reseller Portal, 4) Admin branding colors (all 7 fields) save and persist correctly. Backend reseller_cancel_order now decrements total_revenue_ngn and total_orders.
